meanings.sent1: The nonenzymic reaction proceeded without any help from enzymes.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the nonenzymic pathways in the cell.
meanings.sent3: The nonenzymic experiment was like a baking recipe without any yeast.
meanings.sent4: The nonenzymic process was as independent as a lone wolf in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The nonenzymic nature of the chemical reaction was as clear as a cloudless sky.
